articles.title: Davis Square confronts new normal with unprecedented surge in homelessness, drug use, and violence
articles.description:
Sign up for The Boston Globe’s free Camberville & Beyond newsletter. SOMERVILLE — Below Davis Square, the outreach center the Somerville Homeless Coalition has used for 40 years is a refuge. The coffee is hot and a free breakfast awaits, as does help getting into a home. Above ground, it’s often a different story. And […]
